info.name: My Dark SecondLife
info.description: This style was created to darken the appearance of the marketplace and the web profiles. When it's late at night, I find opening the marketplace to be very aggressive to my eyes. [ Version: 24 | View change logs ]
info.additionalInfo: IMPORTANT: For bug reports, please use Twitter and send me a tweet or a direct message with the link of your issue after posting it in the discussions down below! I don't receive any notifications when somebody is using the Discussions/Feedback button. This style was created for my personal preferences but if there is something you do not like and wish to change, all the necessary information will soon be described inside the code in order to tell you what code does what so you can remove them or change them depending on your preferences. Or feel free to suggest what you want. Features: Most backgrounds of White and Athens Gray have been replaced by some Mine Shaft color and Cod Gray color. Better separations applied between various contents such has the comments from the feed section, the profiles, the friends/followers/mutual friends and more... More modern look to it allowing various transition effects for links, text areas, buttons and notifications are all animated. Wider feed to display larger screenshots and a better view for comments and more. New high quality loading indicator while a tab or a content is loading. The marketplace has been hit by the darkness on September 24! The maps page has been updated as well. Change log: Click here to view the change log on docs Google.
